subject: Real Estate
title: Virtual Tours and the Death of Distance
description: A quick win: understand Virtual Tours and the Death of Distance.

hook.text: During COVID, 63% of buyers made offers on homes they had never visited in person. Virtual tours won.

buildup.text: Matterport's 3D scanning creates digital twins of homes that buyers can walk through from their couch.

discovery.text: Virtual staging, drone footage, and AI floor plans let buyers evaluate a home without leaving their city.

twist.text: Some buyers discovered major problems only after closing â€” proving that pixels can't replace physical presence.

climax.text: Virtual tours expanded the buyer pool globally. But nothing replaces the feel of floorboards beneath your feet.

punchline.text: 63% of pandemic buyers bought homes they'd never walked into.
